pathAssistantSteps.info:
Complete the following tasks:


  1. 📅 Plan your resignation if applicable.
  2. 🏖️ Take some time to relax and recharge.
  3. 🎓 Prepare for your first day of onboarding.

Complete the following tasks:


  1. 📧 Reach out to the hiring manager or recruiter.
  2. 📆 Follow up on your application via email weekly.
  3. 🔍 Continue identifying and saving similar job opportunities.
  4. 📞 Set up weekly networking calls to explore similar companies/roles.

Complete the following tasks:


  1. 📞 Find and research someone who works at the company and add them as a contact.
  2. 📋 Set up an informational interview to learn more about the role/company.
  3. 🔄 Identify potential referrals to help get your application on the top of the pile.
  4. 🛠️ Customize your work achievements using the job description keywords.
  5. 📤 Submit your application on the company website if possible.

Complete the following tasks:


  1. 📬 Send a follow-up email thanking the interviewer and asking for feedback.
  2. 📝 Review your notes and reflect on areas of improvement.

Complete the following tasks:


  1. 🗣️ Prepare your blurb or “tell me about yourself” response.
  2. 📚 Practice answering behavioral interview questions.
  3. 🧐 Research the company and your interviewers.
  4. 💻 Set up your virtual interview space and test your tech.
  5. 💌 Send thank you emails within 24 hours.

Complete the following tasks:


  1. 💰 Research your market value and know your numbers.
  2. 📝 Prepare your negotiation scripts.
  3. ✔️ Evaluate your offer and decline or accept.

Complete the following tasks:


  1. ✅ Check if the job description aligns with your interests and values.
  2. 🔍 Review the highlighted skills to see if the role is a good fit.
  3. 🌟 Research the company or role and mark your excitement level.
